gridpack100.title: GridPack 100
gridpack100.description: REVIUM GridPack 100 is a high-capacity energy storage and management system developed for industrial facilities, defense areas, mobile energy centers, and disaster zones. With integrated inverter, MPPT charge control, intelligent battery management system (BMS), and remote monitoring features, it offers a fully integrated plug-and-play energy station that can manage the entire energy process from a single point. Thanks to its durable structure, long-lasting LiFePO₄ battery technology, and high efficiency, it provides uninterrupted, safe, and sustainable energy under all conditions.

gesPowerStation.title: GES & Power Station
gesPowerStation.description: This innovative solution combines advanced solar panel technology with high-capacity battery storage system, providing uninterrupted, sustainable and efficient power management by intelligently balancing energy production and consumption. REVIUM Storage GES not only produces energy, but also stores excess energy and makes it available for reuse when needed. This reduces grid dependency, lowers energy costs and minimizes carbon footprint. Thanks to its modular architecture, the system can easily adapt to different scales and usage scenarios from industrial facilities to commercial buildings, from rural settlements to mobile energy stations. The integrated Battery Management System (BMS) and remote monitoring infrastructure guarantee safe operating conditions while tracking energy flow in real time. Long-lasting LiFePO₄ battery technology and high-efficiency inverter structure ensure that the system delivers superior results in terms of durability, safety and performance even under the most challenging conditions.

solarportDuo.title: Solarport DUO
solarportDuo.description: SolarPort Duo is an innovative solar-powered parking system that brings together solar energy and modern architecture. Thanks to its durable aluminum-steel construction, high-efficiency solar panels and integrated energy storage unit, it offers both aesthetic and functional solutions. Its structure fully compatible with electric vehicle charging stations transforms parking areas from mere protection areas into active energy production centers. SolarPort Duo is a smart parking system that adds value to future cities with clean energy production, sustainable infrastructure and modern design.

solarVoltwagon.title: Solar VOLTWAGON
solarVoltwagon.description: REVIUM VoltWagon is a portable solar-powered mobile station designed to access energy anywhere. Thanks to its trailer-type modular structure, it can be easily transported; it produces energy with integrated solar panels and provides safe storage with high-capacity LiFePO₄ batteries. It offers fast-installation, environmentally friendly and uninterrupted power solutions in rural areas, disaster areas and field operations. VoltWagon is the new generation portable form of modern energy infrastructure with its compact design that makes mobile energy independence possible.

gesStreetLighting.title: GES Street Lighting System
gesStreetLighting.description: REVIUM Solar StreetLight is a modern LED lighting system powered by solar energy. Thanks to high-efficiency solar panels, integrated LiFePO₄ battery and smart control module, it provides uninterrupted, reliable and balanced lighting throughout the night. With its completely grid-independent operation feature, it reduces energy costs to zero and minimizes maintenance needs. With its aesthetic design, long-lasting structure and environmentally friendly technology, it sets a new standard for sustainable city lighting.
